description:
This simple plugin takes a text string and encrypts it using the aes-256-gcm encryption. It can also take an encrypted value and decrypt it back into the original text string.

You can use it in cases where you don't want to store a plain text value in the database.
name: Encrypt & Decrypt Text
plugin_instructions: Add a secret key (whatever you want) in the Plugins tab. Then just use the "Encrypt string" and "Decrypt string" actions anywhere in the application.
